name: Prodigium (sabacu)
description:
Your vital energy organizes itself in a new way and is reborn as a unique creature. Its type, element, whether it has jaws, beaks or horns will all change its strengths and weaknesses.

Fight and collect magic parts to get stronger and stronger as you hunt the totems that bring monsters to each world.

---

Use W, A, S and D to move, hold SHIFT to run and SPACE to attack, use the MOUSE SCROLL to zoom in or out and TAB or ESC to open the ingame menu

---

This is the prototype of a game that I left halfway through a few months ago and today I decided to strip it down and release it in a simpler way, so as not to be abandoned. If you like it and/or have suggestions, leave a comment, it can make a difference one day to boost the project (or not)
